sameAnalysis.part_name: 这两个形容词均含"羞愧的"之意。
means: ashamed ：用于人，指因干了错事、坏事或傻事等而感到羞愧。
shameful ：指人或人的行为本身不光彩、不道德。

sentence.Network_en: The idea that she witnessed this shameful incident meant nothing to him.
sentence.Network_cn: 虽然她目睹了这可耻的一幕，但是这对他来说无关紧要。

sentence.Network_en: He accused the company of "shameful foot-dragging".
sentence.Network_cn: 他批评这家公司“极其拖沓”。

sentence.Network_en: It was shameful the way she was treated.
sentence.Network_cn: 她竟然受到那样的对待，太不像话了。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 大学英语六级词汇表_大学六级 ... shaft n． 轴,箭杆,矛,杆状物 shameful a． 可耻的；不道德的 shark n． 鲨鱼；贪婪狡猾的人.
可字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 可怖〖 terrible;horrible〗 可耻〖 shameful;disgraceful〗 可待因〖 codeine〗.
高二英语词汇表 ... dignity n. 尊严；尊贵；高贵 shameful adj. 可耻的；丢脸的；不体面的 participate vi. 参与；参加.
新概念英语二册Reward for Virtue ... shame n. 羞愧 shameful adj. 令人羞愧的 ashamed adj. 感到羞愧的.

list.abs: 社会工作专业英语词汇(S3) ... shame aversion therapy 羞恶治疗法 shame culture 面子文化 shame preventing exercises 抗羞训练.
高中英语介词教案 - 豆丁网 ... in public 公开的 in shame 由于害羞 in fun 开玩笑.
shame的翻译查词例句词组... ... can not do it for very shame 不好意思做 crying shame 奇耻大辱 howling shame 奇耻.
实用英语短句 _ 上海疯狂英语 ... Female trouble. 女人真麻烦. For shame. 不要脸. Forget it. 休想.
英语介词用法_百度知道 ... for sale 供出售， for shame 真不害臊， for short 简称，.

entry.def: If you describe a person's action or attitude as shameful, you think that it is so bad that the person ought to be ashamed.

example.ex: ...the most shameful episode in US naval history.
example.tran: 美国海军最屈辱的一段历史

means.word_mean: 1. (used of conduct or character) deserving or bringing disgrace or shame;

sentences.sentence: "Man...has written one of his blackest records as a destroyer on the oceanic islands"- Rachel Carson

means.word_mean: 2. giving offense to moral sensibilities and injurious to reputation;

sentences.sentence: "the wicked rascally shameful conduct of the bankrupt"- Thackeray
"the most shocking book of its time"

auth_sentence.content: It was, of course, shameful beyond words.
auth_sentence.res_content: It was, of course, shameful beyond words.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It was, of course, shameful beyond words.

auth_sentence.content: How shameful of you to distort history here also.
auth_sentence.res_content: How shameful of you to distort history here also.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: How shameful of you to distort history here also.

auth_sentence.content: It is powered exclusively by venality and shameful euphemisms.
auth_sentence.res_content: It is powered exclusively by venality and shameful euphemisms.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It is powered exclusively by venality and shameful euphemisms.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表形容词,"有……的;充满……的"; 2. 表名词,"满,量"

stems_affixes.word_buile: bane毒药,祸害+ful有……的;充满……的→adj.有害的,致祸的
cheer愉快,欢呼+ful有……的;充满……的→adj.愉快的,高兴的
faith信任,信念+ful有……的;充满……的→adj.守信的,忠实的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 健忘的,不注意的,疏忽的
stems_affixes.word_buile: forget忘记+ful有……的;充满……的→adj.健忘的,不注意的,疏忽的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 果实结得多的,多产的,富有成效的
stems_affixes.word_buile: fruit果实+ful有……的;充满……的→adj.果实结得多的,多产的,富有成效的
grace优美+ful有……的;充满……的→adj.优美的
grate=grat感激+ful多……的→adj.[to,for]感激的;感谢的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 给人希望的,抱有希望的
stems_affixes.word_buile: hope希望+ful有……的;充满……的→adj.给人希望的,抱有希望的
power力量+ful有……的;充满……的→adj.强大的,有力的
rue悔恨+ful有……的;充满……的→adj.后悔的,遗憾的
shame耻辱+ful有……的;充满……的→adj.可耻的;不道德的
success成功,胜利+ful有……的;充满……的→adj.成功的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 深思的,有思想性的,体贴的,关切的
stems_affixes.word_buile: thought思考,想法+ful有……的;充满……的→adj.深思的,有思想性的,体贴的,关切的
will意志+ful有……的;充满……的→adj.任性的,故意的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 令人惊奇的,奇妙的,极好的
stems_affixes.word_buile: wonder奇迹+ful有……的;充满……的→adj.令人惊奇的,奇妙的,极好的
hand手+ful满,量→n.一把;少数;一小撮

Sentence.sentence: However,while talking is largely subconscious and rapid, writing is deliberate and slow, Over time,writers took advantage of this and started crafting long-winded sentences such as this one:The whole engagement lasted above 12 hours, till the gradual retreat of the Persians was changed into a disorderly flight, of which the shameful example was given by the principal leaders and……" No one talks like that casually — or should

means.word_mean: 应受责备的;丢脸的;可耻的

sentences.en: Better a glorious death than a shameful life.
sentences.cn: 宁可光明磊落地死,决不卑鄙无耻地生。

sentences.en: He feels it very shameful to sponge on his parents after he’s grown up.
sentences.cn: 他觉得自己长大了还依赖父母感觉很丢脸。

sentences.en: It is very shameful of him to show off.
sentences.cn: 他向人炫耀自己,真不害臊。

sentences.en: Of course,we are aware of their shameful actions.
sentences.cn: 当然,他们的无耻行径,我们是有数的。

sentences.en: We must expose this shameful activity to the newspapers.
sentences.cn: 我们一定要向报社揭露这一无耻行径。

sentences.en: When his employers discovered his shameful past,they hounded him out of the company.
sentences.cn: 当他的雇主发现他过去不光彩的行为后,就把他从公司赶了出去。
